description: Row sums of unsigned triangle A062140 (generalized a=4 Laguerre).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: exp(x/(1-x))/(1-x)^5.a(n) = sum(n!*binomial(n+4, n-m)/m!, m=0..n).a(n) = 2*(n+2)*a(n-1) - (n-1)*(n+3)*a(n-2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 11 2012a(n) ~ exp(2*sqrt(n)-n-1/2)*n^(n+9/4)/sqrt(2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 11 2012
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
